settings.heading: What is shopify and how does it work?
settings.row_content: Shopify is a complete commerce platform that lets you start, grow, and manage a business.Create and customize an online store Sell in multiple places, including web, mobile, social media, online marketplaces, brick-and-mortar locations, and pop-up shops.

settings.heading: What currencies does Shopify work with?
settings.row_content: You can sell and accept payments in many currencies, depending on what payment provider (also known as third party payment processors or payment gateways) you use.
